title: My Portofolio
description: My portofolio website that showcases my profile, skills and projects.

title: Desa Tejang
description: The Tejang Village web app provides easy access to the latest information and complaint services to make it easier for residents to access information and report problems online.

title: Mangrovia
description: Mangrove Identification Area, a Artificial Intelligence web app to identify types of mangroves that are suitable for planting on certain land and recognize types of mangroves based on images.

title: Infocus News
description: A news web app that utilizes Vue.js for the user interface, connected to the Laravel Rest API to perform data manipulation.

title: Logistik Kelautan
description: This website presents all information regarding the Marine Logistics Study Program, Indonesian Education University.

title: RoboNoid
description: A responsive and interactive web app built with React.js that promotes the features of humanoid robots.

title: CineTracker
description: A simple web app that uses React.js to store watched movie data and display it in a list, by retrieving data from the movie API.

title: Filmdex
description: A fetching website employing Vue.js to interact with an API, elegantly presenting a curated list of movies.

title: CineList
description: A fetching website that leverages the React.js JavaScript framework,  with Next.js for interaction with the API, elegantly presenting a list of movies.

title: COMBBIS
description: Cartography Of Mangroves In The Bangka Belitung Islands, a web app for mapping mangroves in Bangka Belitung, including distribution, health and deforestation levels.

title: Pegawaiku
description: A web app for recording employee data that I developed as a practical competency test assignment for Junior Web Developer certification from the Badan Nasional Sertifikasi Profesi (BNSP).

title: ANDINI
description: Aplikasi Pengajuan Dispenisasi Pernikahan Dini, a web application developed with partners in collaboration with PT. Arkatama Multi Solusindo to submit requests, attach the required documents, and monitor the status of early marriage applications efficiently.

title: BKI Activity
description: A web app employee attendance at a Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) company which functions to record attendance and time coordinates, as well as monitor employee planning and activities while working.
